data.lyric:
[ti:Complicated]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Complicated - Mac Miller
[00:06.36]Lyrics by：J. Brion/M. McCormick
[00:12.73]Outside is cloudy but I like that better
[00:17.05]Better better
[00:19.29]Behind the wheel but still ain't on my way
[00:25.54]Some people say they want to live forever
[00:31.99]That's way too long I'll just get through today
[00:37.04]Without any complications
[00:39.86]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:45.04]Does it always gotta does it always gotta
[00:49.89]Gotta be so complicated
[00:52.30]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:57.35]Well I'm way too young to be gettin' old
[01:05.03]And all I wanna do is look but I can't see baby
[01:11.38]Who you talkin' to while you talkin' to me baby
[01:18.62]Let me let me know if I can see you later
[01:25.12]We could make it easy
[01:55.22]Inside my head is getting pretty cluttered
[01:59.39]Cluttered cluttered
[02:01.55]I try but can't clean up this mess I made
[02:08.34]'Fore I start to think about the future
[02:15.27]First can I please get through a day
[02:19.48]Without any complications
[02:22.19]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:27.49]Does it always gotta does it always gotta
[02:32.29]Gotta be so complicated
[02:34.69]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:39.87]Well I'm way too young to be gettin' old
[03:11.96]Some people say they want to live forever
[03:23.33]Without any complications
[03:25.81]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[03:31.57]Does it always gotta does it always gotta
[03:36.30]Gotta be so complicated
[03:38.61]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[03:43.74]Well I'm way too young to be gettin' old
data.trans:
[ti:Complicated]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.36]//
[00:12.73]外面乌云密布 可我喜欢这样的天气
[00:17.05]//
[00:19.29]握紧方向盘 可我还没有出发
[00:25.54]有人说他们向往永生
[00:31.99]人生太过漫长 我先熬过今天再说吧
[00:37.04]简简单单就好 别太复杂
[00:39.86]//
[00:45.04]难道非此不可 难道非此不可
[00:49.89]总是要这么复杂吗
[00:52.30]//
[00:57.35]好吧 我非常年轻 离迟暮之年还早着呢
[01:05.03]宝贝 我只想静观其变 可我什么也看不见
[01:11.38]宝贝 你和我说话的时候 你究竟在和谁交谈
[01:18.62]如果我等会儿能见到你 请告诉我
[01:25.12]我们可以轻松一点
[01:55.22]我的思绪混乱不堪
[01:59.39]//
[02:01.55]我竭尽全力 可我无法理清头绪
[02:08.34]在我考虑未来之前
[02:15.27]我首先担心我能否熬过一天
[02:19.48]简简单单就好 别太复杂
[02:22.19]//
[02:27.49]难道非此不可 难道非此不可
[02:32.29]总是要这么复杂吗
[02:34.69]//
[02:39.87]好吧 我非常年轻 离迟暮之年还早着呢
[03:11.96]有人说他们向往永生
[03:23.33]简简单单就好 别太复杂
[03:25.81]//
[03:31.57]难道非此不可 难道非此不可
[03:36.30]总是要这么复杂吗
[03:38.61]//
[03:43.74]好吧 我非常年轻 离迟暮之年还早着呢
